events.title: Letter Filed Regarding Epstein's Jail Conditions
events.description: Attorney Bruce Barket transmits a letter to a judge detailing continued inhumane prison conditions for Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

keyFacts: Attorney Bruce Barket corresponded about Jeffrey Epstein's 'continued inhumane prison conditions' at MCC in August 2020.
The communication was directed to a judge and copied to the MCC's lawyer, the prosecution team, and 'firewall counsel'.
The email date (August 20, 2020) is after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019, suggesting ongoing legal matters or inquiries related to his incarceration.
The attached letter filename suggests it was addressed to 'Judge Karas' regarding the conditions.
